title: Device stuck at "waiting for fastboot command..."
content: Hi, I am trying to restore my google pixel tablet to factory setting using the Android repair option. However, it send me to a screen which says "no command", with the Android laying down on. Then, I hold the power button and volume up to progress to the next screen; this is when I end up on the "waiting fastboot command screen" without progressing. Anyone has a similar issue?
